item.title: A Universal Time (AUT) Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
A Universal Time is an action-adventure game within Roblox, boasting core RPG elements and a world that’s been heavily inspired by Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure and other similar anime stories. A Universal Time requires players to explore a large world and gain powers along the way. Alongside their exploration of the map, they will be required to take on various opponents, including NPCs as well as real players. Although the biggest inspiration for A Universal Time is Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, with the game including many of the anime’s ‘Stands’, it also showcases characters from other popular anime, including Dragon Ball, One Piece, and more. 

You will have to progress through the game to get stronger and unlock more powerful moves, and for newer players to the game, that can be a daunting task. With both PvP and PvE fights involved, getting ahead of the competition fast is of utmost importance, and using codes is a good way to make some quick progress. A Universal Time codes give players various rewards in the game, including Skin Chests, UCoins, UShards, and more, all of which will come in handy to the average player.

All New A Universal Time Codes (October 2025)

  • KARSWHAT (NEW)
  • SORRYFORDELYA (NEW)

  • GUTSISHERE
  •  HUTAO

  •  thxfor740k

  •  SORRYFORPHASE4DELAY
  •  SAVEDAUTFROMSHADOW
  •  ARCADE
  •  UPDATE361
  •  SHADOW
  •  SORRYFORSHUTDOWNAGAIN2
  •  SORRYFORSHUTDOWNAGAIN
  •  SORRYFORDATAISSUES
  •  SUMMERUPDATEPHASE3
  •  PHASETHREE

Although the game currently has only two active codes, more are likely to be added in the future. A Universal Time codes often have fixed timeframes when they will be usable, meaning that when existing codes expire, new ones will be added.

With this in mind, we encourage players to bookmark this page, as any new codes or expirations will be updated here immediately. Although you can keep track of new codes by joining the game’s official Discord or through their socials, keeping tabs on our page is going to be the easiest way to do so.

How To Redeem A Universal Time Codes

A Universal Time is one of those games where, before you can redeem codes, there is a criterion that needs to be met. Before you can make use of the above codes, you will have to join the A Universal Time Roblox group. Once you have done that, follow the steps given below to redeem your A Universal Time rewards. 

  • Launch Roblox and open A Universal Time
  • Press the ‘M’ key on your keyboard to open up the shop
  • Select the Miscellaneous option to reach the codes tab
  • Enter one of the active codes given above into the text box
  • Click on ‘Redeem Code’ to receive your rewards

For more Roblox Guides and trending games, check out Weak Legacy 2 Codes, which is a hugely popular game now on Roblox.

item.title: Discord Hackers Claim To Have 1.5TB Of Age Verification Photos
item.content:encoded:
Details of the recent Discord data hack continue to paint a darker picture for the company and its users. According to Discord news source Discord Previews, the group taking responsibility for the compromise claims to have an enormous amount of user data, specifically millions of user photos.

In a post on social media Discord Previews said that “the perpetrators of this attack claim to have obtained 1.5 TB of age-verification photos totalling 2,185,151 images.” It was added that the stolen data is being used, as with most instances like this, to “extort Discord”.

On October 3, Discord publicly announced that an “unauthorized party compromised one of Discord’s third-party customer service providers.” This incident, which happened in late September, had the following data impacted:

  • Name, Discord username, email, and other contact details if provided to Discord customer support
  • Limited billing information, such as payment type, the last four digits of your credit card, and purchase history, if associated with your account
  • IP addresses
  • Messages with our customer service agents 
  • Limited corporate data (training materials, internal presentations)

Information such as full credit card and CCV numbers, private messages, passwords, and other authentication data wasn’t involved.

According to Discord’s own policies, ID submissions are supposed to be deleted after age verification is complete.

“Discord and k-ID do not permanently store personal identity documents or your video selfies,” they say. “The image of your identity document and the ID face match selfie are deleted directly after your age group is confirmed, and the video selfie used for facial age estimation never leaves your device.”

Insider Gaming has reached out to Discord for comment on how the company is looking to move forward and why so many age-verification photos were still within the company’s database. Should a response be received, it will be added to this story.

What do you think of the Discord hack leaving millions of user photos and information exposed? Leave your thoughts down in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming, check out what games were the best-selling titles for August 2025. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
